description:
Expression analysis of LTR-derived miR-1269a and target gene, KSR2 in Sebastes schlegelii.

Search for predicted microRNA targets in mammals.

[Go to the newest version of TargetScanHuman].

1. Select a species Human Mouse Rat Chimpanzee Rhesus Cow Dog Opossum Chicken Frog.

2. Enter a human gene symbol (e.g. "Hmga2").

* broadly conserved = conserved across most vertebrates, usually to zebrafish.

Fromm B, Billipp T, Peck LE, Johansen M, Tarver JE, King BL, Newcomb JM, Sempere LF, Flatmark K, Hovig E, Peterson KJ. A Uniform System for the Annotation of Vertebrate microRNA Genes and the Evolution of the Human microRNAome. Annual Review of Genetics, 49:213-42 (2015).

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'miRDB' (bio.tools/miRDB), 'KSR2 Sebastes schlegelii', 'Sebastes schlegelii', 'KSR2 miR-1269a'
name: vert_71
